method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Snippet.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Snippet with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Snippet with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Snippet with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Snippets within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Snippet, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Snippet, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The Snippet, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Snippet, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Snippet in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Snippet in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Snippet in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Snippet with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the Snippet that follows the desired Snippet.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Snippet whose index follows the specified Snippet in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The Snippet whose index comes before the desired Snippet.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Snippet in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Snippet in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Snippet.
Returns the Snippet with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
